entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
